question: Which of the following best describes why online marketing metrics are important?

answers.text: Online marketing metrics help marketers understand whether or not their products and services create value for consumers.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Online marketing metrics do not measure the effectiveness of marketing managers.

answers.text: Online marketing metrics are an important part of understanding the factors that influence consumer behavior.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Online marketing metrics so not help marketers understand consumer behavior.

answers.text: Online marketing metrics help marketers measure the effectiveness of marketing managers.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Online marketing metrics do not really help marketers understand how their product and service provide value to consumers.

answers.text: Online marketing metrics help marketers measure the performance of their online marketing campaigns.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Online marketing metrics help marketers measure the performance of their online marketing campaigns.

detailedSolution: Online marketing metrics help marketers measure the performance of their online marketing campaigns.
